fields.name: iframeUrl
fields.label: iFrame URL
fields.description: Please provide a URL to an iFrame app.

fields.name: heightMobile
fields.label: Height in px (mobile)
fields.description: Custom height for mobile in pixels (e.g., 500). Leave empty for default.

fields.name: heightDesktop
fields.label: Height in px (desktop)
fields.description: Custom height for desktop in pixels (e.g., 800). Leave empty for default.
